meanings.definition: Not fully developed or grown; young
meanings.sent1: The immatures birds chirped loudly in the nest.
meanings.sent2: The zoo had a special exhibit featuring immatures animals.
meanings.sent3: The immatures puppies played together in the yard.
meanings.sent4: Her immatures talent for painting showed great potential.
meanings.sent5: The immatures plants needed more sunlight to grow.

meanings.definition: Lacking maturity or the qualities of maturity
meanings.sent1: His immatures behavior at the party embarrassed his friends.
meanings.sent2: The immatures decision to skip class had consequences.
meanings.sent3: The immatures jokes made everyone laugh at the party.
meanings.sent4: Her immatures attitude towards responsibility was concerning.
meanings.sent5: The immatures response to criticism showed a lack of growth.
